title: A Dc Universe Christmas
description: In this book of holiday mirth, heroes and villains alike enjoy and endure the Christmas season. Collecting 17 tales from over the last 60 years, this timeless tome allows the reader to experience how the yuletide season affects the men and women who have dedicated their lives to self-sacrifice and thankless heroism. Featuring Batman, Superman, Green Lantern, Green Arrow, Wonder Woman, Flash, Poison Ivy, and Harley Quinn, this book includes stories that vary in tone from somber to hysterical to cheerful. Not only a wonderful holiday read, A DC UNIVERSE CHRISTMAS is also a great retrospective of DC Comics' publishing history.
